predicate.note: Frames file for 'overemphasize' based on transformation of 'emphasize' frames.

example.name: context? what context?
example.text: ``One can hardly overemphasize the importance of her rear end,'' Ms. Rose writes.
example.arg: the importance of her rear end

example.name: with hearer
example.text: Mary overemphasized to John that he must never ever call her 'Snoogie-wookums' in public.
example.arg: he must never ever call her 'Snoogie-wookums' in public.
